message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY

This paper deals with natural language processing techniques to summarize product reviews. The paper uses clustering and facet identification to generate a concise summary of the reviews. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also uses techniques such as text classification and clustering, which are commonly used in sub-categories such as cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper uses machine learning algorithms to identify the underlying reasons for users' opinions, which is a common topic in sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
